pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Mediation Analysis in Presence of Multiple Mediators Uncausally Related // Estimates key quantities in causal mediation analysis - including average causal mediation effects (indirect effects), average direct effects, total effects, and proportions mediated - in the presence of multiple uncausally related mediators. Methods are described by Jrolon et al., (2021) doi:10.1515/ijb-2019-0088 and extended to accommodate survival outcomes as described by Domingo-Relloso et al., (2024) doi:10.1101/2024.02.16.24302923.
